title: Video from Pakistan Shared as Missing Tamil Girl Found in Nagpur
subtitle: Fact Check | The policeman’s uniform and the phone number and address details provided in the video suggest that the video is from Karachi in Pakistan and not from Nagpur, and was posted in December 2018. The claim in the shared post is false.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video doing rounds on the internet is claiming that a missing Tamil girl has been found in Nagpur.

The video shows a police officer appealing to the family of the girl to come and take her from the police station. He further adds that the child is unable to provide any details about her and her family and the video must be shared so that it reaches her parents.
